what_is_aibro.question: What is AIBRO Business?
what_is_aibro.answer: AIBRO Business is an ecosystem of AI tools for automating small and medium businesses, fully integrated into Telegram. We help automate content creation, customer communication, booking, and other routine tasks.

why_telegram.question: Why Telegram?
why_telegram.answer: Telegram is not just a messenger. It's a full-fledged business platform with channels, groups, bots, and built-in payments. We make this work automatic.

tech_knowledge.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
tech_knowledge.answer: No. If you know how to use Telegram, you can use AIBRO Business. Everything is managed through simple commands and buttons in the bot.

postmaster_features.question: What is included in AI PostMaster?
postmaster_features.answer: AI PostMaster automatically creates and publishes content for your Telegram channels. It includes: text generation (Gemini 2.0 Flash), image generation (Imagen 4 Fast), smart scheduling, and brand personalization.

can_edit_posts.question: Can I edit posts before publication?
can_edit_posts.answer: Yes! By default, 'human-in-the-loop' mode is enabledâ€”you see the post before publication and can edit or reject it. You can also enable auto-publication for full automation.

other_products_eta.question: When will other products (Conversation Bot, etc.) be available?
other_products_eta.answer: Conversation Bot is planned for Q1 2026, Booking Bot for Q2 2026, and Feedback Bot for Q2 2026. Subscribe to updates to be the first to know.

free_trial.question: Is there a free trial?
free_trial.answer: Yes! 7 days of free access to AI PostMaster. No credit card required. After the trial, you can choose a suitable plan or cancel.

cancel_anytime.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
cancel_anytime.answer: Yes. There are no long-term contracts. Cancel your subscription at any time through the bot. Access will remain until the end of the paid period.

custom_plan.question: What if I need more/fewer products?
custom_plan.answer: The modular system allows you to add or remove products at any time. You only pay for what you use.

data_security.question: Is my data secure?
data_security.answer: Yes. All data is stored in encrypted form. We use Google Cloud infrastructure with SOC 2 Type II certification. Your personal Data Store is accessible only to you.

content_access.question: Who has access to my posts and content?
content_access.answer: Only you. The AI generates content based on your data, but we do not store or use your content for training models.

get_help.question: How can I get help?
get_help.answer: Message @AIBRO_Support on Telegram. The average response time is 2 hours (on Pro/Business plans). A knowledge base and video tutorials are also available.
